text: HELP  I m feeling helpless and suicidalI ve never considered suicide as an option up until this point in my life  I m feeling terribly helpless and don t know how to solve this fucking problem  except for ending my own life      My parents kicked me out of the house and let me out on the streets  While this may sound bad   and it is  it actually helped me feel free enough to pursue my interests and develop my autonomy  In a very short time  I managed to do very good  enjoying independence in thought  action  and income  However  due to circumstances that are too long to explain  my parents regretted their decision and now I m in contact with them again  The problem is that this devastating fear of helplessness has reemerged in me which  as strange as it sounds  feels like it s denying that independence that I ve gained     I keep hearing a negative  shaming voice telling me   What you re doing thinking feeling is stupid and worthless  which prompts me to avoid working  or thinking those things that help me work  e g  planning  I understand this to be a mechanism of undermining my independence so that I can be dependent on my parents  so they won t feel abandoned  I can t take this anymore  I don t know what to do and it s wearing me down      I feel totally powerless and helpless  The people who normally support me don t understand me  they think it s a good thing I m in contact with my parents  and don t understand this feeling of helplessness that completely impairs my ability to do literally anything  I don t want this anymore  and I keep thinking of suicide as the only way out  because I have no idea how I m going to mute  minimize  or eliminate that voice that puts me down so viciously I just don t have the time or energy anymore  Please help
summary: My parents kicked me out of the house and let me out on the streets. They regretted their decision and now I'm in contact with them again. The fear of helplessness has reemerged in me. I keep hearing a negative shaming voice telling me that I'm stupid and worthless.

text: I don t have any reason to stick aroundWhenever I get like this and it s usually over stupid stuff I obviously try to talk myself out of it because I haven t been in therapy for   years or stopped self harming without developing the knee jerk reaction of telling myself I m a fucking idiot and to not be such a self centred pile of shit when I want to die But when it comes down to it I don t have anything to live for or look forward to   I can t leave my pets but they re mostly rats and they don t live very long anyway  At most it delays me a couple years  My puppy would be ok with a different home  my mum can look after my cat  I have no friends  I have no future  Why do I stay when there is nothing to look forward to  What s the point in living if it s shit Eveb if I got better I d still have to deal with my anxiety forever  I d still have to relearn how to be a fucking human I d still have to do so many things to get me to be a useful part of society that would be so fucking difficult emotionally to get to that even when I m not feeling really bad it doesn t seem worth it Like  I get better and get a job that I may or may not enjoy so I can barely scrape by until I die naturally and alone anyway  Why  What about that is something I should want to do  What s the point of that   I don t see myself having a nice future and that makes it so hard in times when I m feeling like ass to pull through it to get back to my normal baseline of being apathetic towards my existence And I will  I always do  But life is still bullshit and not worth it  I just wish I never existed in the first place
summary: I don't have any reason to stay in this life. I can't leave my pets. I have no friends. I don't see myself having a nice future. Even if I get better, I can barely scrape by until I die.
cleaned: not reason stay life not leave pet no friend not have nice future well barely scrape die

text: It s my  th birthdayAnd I m thinking about suicide   What a way to spend my  th birthday  huh   Birthdays and New Years are always bad for me   What have I accomplished over the past year    What have I accomplished over the past   years   Nothing    Today I m not only    But I m an   year old kissless virgin    I should point out this isn t the only reason I have depression   Most people getting their first kiss when they re       etc   Me     years and never even gotten close to a kiss    Since it s been   years  it makes me think I ll never get it   Neither sex   Considering every girl I message  doesn t reply back and I m too scared to go talk to girls in person because of social anxiety    I honestly never see myself getting a girlfriend  a kiss  or getting laid   I don t want to live another day being a kissless virgin   I know I m young   I know I m only    But I see me in this same situation when I m       and so on    I m lonely because of depressed  and I m depressed because I m lonely   All I want is someone to hug  kiss and cuddle   Is that so hard to ask for   Do you know how much better I d feel   I m so fucking lonely I hug my pillow   I m sick of being alone and I m considering suicide   I need help
